name: Apocrypha
description:
Note: Please consider playing the windows build for best performance and visual quality

Unlock the secrets, escape the nightmare. One wrong turn, and you're back at the beginning of the death loop. Find your way to the exit to end the cycle.

Use your Phone(RMB) and Flashlight(LMB) to uncover notes from a mysterious precursor.

Evade lethal Enemies and Traps in your attempt to escape.
